title: Is it easy to publish a book on Kindle? - Quora

response.answer_text: Very easy. All you need is edited text in Word and a cover design. I recommend Self-Publishing, Book Printing & Distribution Company for eBook conversion and they will design a cover for a small fee. You will need your own ISBN (only one) Amazon Kindle doesn’t use the standard ISBN. They use their own ID #.

To publish? Easy, in my opinion. Mind you, I’ve worked in digital publishing almost as long as it’s existed (since the mid-1990s). I take for granted a lot of the underlying technology. Your mileage may vary. But to write something that’s worth publishing, that’s the hard part. Full stop. Anybody can publish. 90% of those who do really shouldn’t.
